editorialNotes.short: Help yourself resist distractions from your device.

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone needs a task manager—and Things is adaptable enough for anyone. This Apple Design Award winner is crisp and lightweight, featuring a simple but effective interface. The ever-present Magic Plus button makes it easy to add to-dos from anywhere in the app, and organizing items is as simple as dragging them where you want them. It’s like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.
editorialNotes.short: Organize class projects, assignments and daily to-do lists.

ios.subtitle: We do the math for you!
Call with any PBX or Provider

editorialNotes.standard: This writing app is designed to let you type without distraction. Key features we’ve come to depend on include the customizable keyboard, iCloud sync, and its streamlined interface for easy document preview and access.
editorialNotes.short: A streamlined interface with a customisable keyboard, iCloud sync and more.

ios.subtitle: A web browser with F1-12 + Tab

name: 屏记-将重要事项焊在屏保上

editorialNotes.short: Cute bear Tom will help you focus whenever you need concentration.
editorialNotes.tagline: A furry friend to motivate you
The tools for your first draft

editorialNotes.standard: Protect private information your way in OneSafe’s versatile digital vault. Industrial-strength encryption lets you secure financial details, logins, documents and more—even scanned credit cards—with a single PIN, password or a drawn pattern. Accessing data is a snap thanks to easy organisation and seamless syncing across devices. Complete with Safari integration and automatic strong password creation, OneSafe is the right kind of security tool—the kind you’ll want to use every day.

ios.subtitle: Share text to the lock screen.
Address book to Excel and csv

editorialNotes.standard: Odds are you aren’t in the market for a new calculator app. But you should be. A 2018 Apple Design Award winner, the app is gorgeous on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch, and was built to provide a seamless experience.
editorialNotes.short: Calculate with Haptic Touch and get the results in 65 languages.
